alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 2:23AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Greene and southern Clay Counties through 300 AM CST... At 223 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Evening Star, or 8 miles north of Crowleys Ridge State Park, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paragould, Rector, Marmaduke, Oak Grove Heights, Lafe, Knobel, O`Kean, Peach Orchard, Delaplaine, Evening Star, Beech Grove, Crockett, Stonewall, Heubner, Tipperary, Fritz, Case, Brookings, Light and Leonard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
